IPv4Address.description: This type describes an IPv4 Address.

AddressOrigin.description: This indicates how the address was determined.
AddressOrigin.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the IP address origin for this network interface.

Gateway.description: This is the IPv4 gateway for this address.

SubnetMask.description: This is the IPv4 Subnet mask.

enumDescriptions.BOOTP: Address is provided by a BOOTP service.
enumDescriptions.DHCP: Address is provided by a DHCPv4 service.
enumDescriptions.IPv4LinkLocal: Address is valid only for this network segment (link).
enumDescriptions.Static: A static address as configured by the user.

IPv6Address.description: This type describes an IPv6 Address.

AddressOrigin.description: This indicates how the address was determined.

AddressState.description: The current state of this address as defined in RFC 4862.

PrefixLength.description: This is the IPv6 Address Prefix Length.

enumDescriptions.DHCPv6: Address is provided by a DHCPv6 service.
enumDescriptions.LinkLocal: Address is valid only for this network segment (link).
enumDescriptions.SLAAC: Address is provided by a Stateless Address AutoConfiguration (SLAAC) service.
enumDescriptions.Static: A static address as configured by the user.

IPv6GatewayStaticAddress.description: This object represents a single IPv6 static address to be assigned on a network interface.

PrefixLength.description: The Prefix Length of this IPv6 address.

IPv6StaticAddress.description: This object represents a single IPv6 static address to be assigned on a network interface.

Address.longDescription: This property provides access to a static IPv6 address that is currently assigned on a network interface.

PrefixLength.description: The Prefix Length of this IPv6 address.

enumDescriptions.Deprecated: This address is currently within it's valid lifetime, but is now outside of it's preferred lifetime as defined in RFC 4862.
enumDescriptions.Failed: This address has failed Duplicate Address Detection testing as defined in RFC 4862 section 5.4 and is not currently in use.
enumDescriptions.Preferred: This address is currently within both it's valid and preferred lifetimes as defined in RFC 4862.
enumDescriptions.Tentative: This address is currently undergoing Duplicate Address Detection testing as defined in RFC 4862 section 5.4.

description: The JSON Schema File resource describes the location (URI) of a particular Redfish schema definition being implemented or referenced by a Redfish service.
title: #IPAddresses.v1_1_0
